brooklyn.enricher
[Java] Class Enrichers

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.enricher.Enrichers

public class Enrichers
Nested Class Summary
static class Enrichers.AggregatorBuilder

static class Enrichers.Builder

static class Enrichers.CombinerBuilder

static class Enrichers.InitialBuilder

static class Enrichers.PropagatorBuilder

static class Enrichers.TransformerBuilder

builds an enricher which transforms a given sensor:

  • applying a function (computing(Function), or computingAverage()/computingSum(), mandatory);
  • and publishing it on the entity where the enricher is attached;
  • optionally taking the sensor from a different source entity (from(Entity));
  • and optionally publishing it as a different sensor (publishing(AttributeSensor));
